title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API—chat, embed, pull, push, and list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed chat, embed, and model management APIs.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI backend that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Tiny Python package that adds sentence-transformers-style embedding interface to Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama LLMs into channels with configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles and datasets fine-tuned for Ollama (code, medical, RPG).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG with Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community index of 300+ user-contributed Modelfiles for niche domains (law, finance, anime).
